titles.title: In the morning when I rise

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the morning when I rise
In the morning when I rise
In the morning when I rise
Give me Jesus

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus give me Jesus
You can have all this world
But give me Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And when I am alone
Oh and when I am alone
And when I am alone
Give me Jesus

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And when I come to die
Oh and when I come to die
And when I come to die
Give me Jesus

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus give me Jesus
You can have all this world
You can have all this world
You can have all this world
But give me Jesus
